summary: Allow you to Transform into a Demon, unlocks unique spells and Abilities
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF0000]DEMON FORM[/color]

1. Lore
2. Description
3. Spells
4. Perks and Disadvantages
5. Future updates
5. Permissions
6. Credits

=======================================================================================

1.LORE

You have been told about The Nine. The eight and one. But you have never been told about the tenth God. The Keeper of The Dead and Lord of Oblivion. Malegas.

When Mankind were created, Malegas created another simular race. Stronger then the rest. He gave them abilities not fit for this realm. So The Gods bannished Malegas. Chained him to forever root in Oblivion. 

Without their evil creator. The Demons were vurnerable. That is when Stendarr blessed his believers, making them into what they now call \" The Vigilants of Stendarr\". Blessed by the divines the Vigilants crushed every single demon they could find and cast them back to oblivion. 

But.. One of the Demon´s chained his soul into a book. Cursing it, 
-\"whoever open this book shall be mortal no longer\"


And so the story goes.. The Book where lost. Never found.. Until now...

=============================================================================

2.DESCRIPTION

This mod gives you the ability to transform into a Demon. Which gives you unique spells and abilites. As a demon you will be able to to conjure storms, master the art of destruction, alteration, conjuration and illusion. 


3.SPELLS

Apocalyptic Storm - Conjures a massive storm, casting fireballs at everything inside a 600 area for 1 minute.

Demon Form - Transforms you into A Demon. ( Adding all the Demonic Spells

Human Form - consceling yourself as a mere human. ( Removing every Demonic spells )

Soul Harvest - Sucks the soul of your target, damaging the target, and healing yourself.

Shadow Form - As a demon you allow yourself to be consumed by the darkness, the shadow damaging you for 30 seconds but you are 100 % immune to weapon damage for 30 seconds.

Teleport To Oblivion - Teleports The Demon to Oblivion ( not yet finished but available)

Demonic Possess - Possess the target, making him controllable.

Bending Knees - You bend every bone inside the Targets body, Making him freeze in place for 30 seconds ( 24 gametime hour cd. )

Demon Push - You push the target forward. ( dual wield able for stronger effect )

Demonic Leap - The Shadow guides your way forward. Damaging you for 10 dmg but gives you a huge speed burst ( Not yet finished )

========================================================================================

4.PERKS AND DISADVANTAGES

Why do you want to be a Demon?

Well.. everything has it´s advantages and disadvantages. Here they are:

Friend of The Dead - As a Demon you are friendly with the dead ( skeletons ). The dead has also given you a +10 skill to Destruction and Conjuration.

Hated by The Holy - As a Demon you are not able to walk on holy ground. Doing so will cause your skin to burn. In addition, The Vigilants of Stendarr will become your sworn enemy. 

Cursed by the Gods - The Gods of The Nine does not smile upon you. If you equip an amulet of one of the gods of the nine, you will instantly die. ( Not yet finished )

===================================================================================

5. FUTURE UPDATES

every spell/ability marked as \"( not yet finished )\" will be fixed in next update.

Future questline to unchain Malegas and reclaim what is his.

More spells!

More abilities!

If you have any cool ideas please feel free to pm me or write in comments :)

=============================================================================

6. PERMISSIONS

You may not upload this mod on any other site. And do not use any of my content in your own mod unless you pm me and i accept.

===============================================================================
